headline: Anima Announces IBM's Investment to Power AI for Enterprise Product Teams
summary: Anima, a leader in AI design-to-code space, today announced a strategic investment from IBM to accelerate enterprise adoption of vibe coding: the new way for product teams to design and build apps with AI. As the only API-first design-to-code platform with a seamless integration with Figma, Anima is strategically positioned at the intersection of AI-native developer tools and enterprise modernization. headline: Disney’s New Leadership Split Highlights Parks Power And Content Questions
summary: Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) has named Josh D'Amaro as its next CEO, effective March 18, 2026. Dana Walden has been appointed to a newly created President and Chief Creative Officer role. The moves formalize the succession from Bob Iger and reshape Disney's senior leadership structure. For investors watching NYSE:DIS, this announcement comes after a stretch of weaker share performance, with the stock at $107.05 and showing declines of 4.3% year to date and 42.2% over five years. The leadership...
